explains: vt. 拒绝；否定；批判；与……断绝关系；拒付

sentences.en: The worker was bound to the master by a mutual contract that either one could repudiate, and the relationship was conceptualized as one of partnership.
sentences.cn: 工人和雇主因为共同合约而联系在一起，这一合约双方中任何一方都能拒绝履行，而且这种关系在概念上是一种合伙关系。

sentences.en: Leaders urged people to turn out in large numbers to repudiate the violence.
sentences.cn: 领导们力劝人们集体出面来声讨该暴力。

sentences.en: He would repudiate all debts incurred by his son.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝偿还他儿子的一切债务。
